title: Pfizer Says Its Covid-19 Pill Likely Works Against Omicron
sub_head: Antiviral drug Paxlovid stayed 89% effective at reducing the risk of hospitalization and death in a final analysis of a key study in high-risk adults
body:
Preliminary laboratory tests gave encouraging signs that Pfizer Inc.â€™s experimental Covid-19 pill for the newly infected could work against Omicron, the company said.
Pfizer also said Tuesday that a final analysis of late-stage study results confirmed the drug, named Paxlovid, was 89% effective at reducing the risk of hospitalization and death in adults at high risk of severe Covid-19.
